title: Smoked Sausage and Potato Soup
ingredients: ['4 potatoes, cubed', '1 onion, chopped', '1 stick celery, cut into 1.25cm pieces', '400ml beef stock', '415ml chicken stock', '250ml water', '335g kielbasa sausage, sliced into 1.25cm pieces', '1 (295g) tin cream of chicken condensed soup', 'ground black pepper to taste']
